title: Patcher wont update
body:
I've had this issue before, usually I just keep opening it and it gets a little farther each time. Now coming back from a deployment I tried to update my client and the patcher shows the League of Legends symbol on my desktop with the bar underneath it, it fills up to about 10-15% and then just cuts off. I've tried to just keep opening it and hoping it fixes, done that about 15 times, no such luck there. I've made sure it's allowed access, didnt do anything. And now I just completely removed it from my computer, and tried to redownload it, still goes up to the 10-15% and disappears. Doesn't give me an error or anything, just disappears. Any helpful suggestions?

I've also run it as admin and still nothing.

replies.body:
This is probably due to network instability.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

Nope, I tried all the options there and nothing worked. I even blocked it on the firewall and allowed it again, restarted the computer and tried it. Didn't work. I can post the Patcher Logs if that would help whatsoever
I tried all of the tips, and still disappears after 10-15%

Since you've tried all the steps from the guides that offer the most common solutions, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), you'll empower our techs to dive into your logs and find a quick and effective solution. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Finished patching the game, works perfectly fine now. Thank you!
I used to the Repair Tool to force a repatch, and now its working! Just got past the logo, client is open now and updating. Will let you know if I can play. Thank you!!

I've followed all possible steps that I was told about/given, and so far nothing has worked. I've just tried to uninstall/reinstall once more, and still nothing. Really wanna get back into this game :(
My patcher didn't update, i have upgrade it since 3am until 6am its still 0% and the file searching is over 15k.
Let it scan, this usually due to corrupt or damages game files. It can take a while depending on how many files are corrupted and the speed of your computer.
